text: @DanPatrick Mr. L.G. please understand that in her behavior(incendiary to say the least) and that of those who have no personal account with COVID-19 is hard to swallow. Flouting her status and giving pure unadulterated disregard to 60k+ families for their sacrifice. Seems she hers.
